page.title: 08 A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I get up in the morning at 7.30. I get dressed at 7.50.Then I go downstairs and have my breakfast.I have Shredded Wheat or Cornflakes and a cup of tea. Then I get ready for school.I put my shoes and coat on and collect my bag.I walk to school with Kerry and my brother. We leave just after 8.52 and arrive there at 8.55. The bell rings at 9.00 and we lead in .First the registers are called and then we have assembly, except for Fridays.Then we get on with our work. At 10.30 it is time for play.At 12.00 we have our lunch and at 14.05 we have last play.Most days we have P.E. At 15.10 we go home.When{I}get home I do 30 minutes piano practice and then I go to clubs such as French or Girls Brigade.I have my dinner at about 19.00.Then I watch a favourite T.V. programme.I go to bed at 21.30.
